title: Buddy Guy 1991-08-24 Red Rocks Morrison CO
description:
Here is a nice bootleg recording. Check my account for more classic bootlegs.

More Buddy Guy coming up within the hour :)

Please enjoy, share with friends and please seed.


I was very fortunate that I was able to attend and record this show. It was by far the best blues show I ever attended - the one and only time I saw Albert Collins and Etta James. Albert comes out and plays with Buddy for a track or two. Nice recording - sample included.

**** 44 KHz / 16 bit **** (CD Version) 

Buddy Guy
August 24, 1991 (1991-08-24) 
Red Rocks Ampitheatre
Morrison, Colorado
USA

Blues on the Rocks 1991

Big Head Todd & Monsters
John Hammond
Albert Collins and the Ice Breakers
Buddy Guy
Etta James
BB King


01.[00:42] Introduction
02.[05:59] Sweet Home Chicago
03.[10:47] Five Long Years 
04.[11:25] Crazy About You > I Just Wanna Make Love To You
05.[03:25] Everything's Gonna Be Alright
06.[13:01] Knock On Wood
07.[02:07] Cold Shot
08.[02:17] Sunshine Of Your Love
09.[03:30] Love Her With a Feeling medley
10.[03:26] Anyway You Look At It
11.[03:48] I'll Play the Blues For You > outro

Total 1:00:27

Lineage: Unknown Aiwa hand-held mic > Sony D6 

Transfer: Sony TC-WE475 > Microtrack II (96/24) > Wavelab (tracking and tweaking) > Flac (level 8) > you !  

whotrader-0649-bg-1991-08-24-44
